contextId.information: Paul uses "we" to refer to himself and all true believers in Christ, including the Philippian believers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_inclusive]])
"let us all continue obeying the same truth we have already received" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_inclusive]])
contextId.quote: whatever we have reached, let us hold on to it
